name: HealthRIGHT 360
description: HealthRIGHT 360 (HR 360) gives hope, builds health, and changes lives for people in need. In San Francisco, HR 360 provides a diverse array of programs and services at fifteen distinct locations where they operate: - four primary medical clinics - seven residential programs - four outpatient/day reporting centers - two gender responsive jail programs - co-occurring programming - case management services - outreach and prevention programs - employment, housing and educational assistance Together,

address: 1563 Mission Street, 5th Floor, San Francisco, CA, 94103
